name: Texas Native Health
description: Texas Native Health is an Urban Indian Organization providing accessible and culturally sensitive medical, dental, lab, and behavioral health services, as well as educational and workforce services to Native Americans in Texas
services: American-Indian-owned Cardiovascular surgery in Texas consultation
